title: Fiddle vs swain (battle of the crows)
body:
just spent a few (6) hours working on this to find out i am not in the correct region (the UK) to enter the "Face off in our fanart contest!" 
so i will just leave it here for everyone to enjoy :)
though if i was to compare myself to the amazing artist that play this game i am sure i wouldn't come close to winning (i dont even know how to use photoshop :O)

in this i feature Union Jack {{champion:9}} about to pop his {{item:3157}} (which i just realised you can't see due to a bird being in the way) mid crowstorm against {{champion:50}} 
the main focus is that the 2 champions are letting their birds fight it out to see who's is the most dominant bird.

replies.body: I must say, I quite like it.

Really? Do I have to do this?
OK then. At the bottom of the picture. An eye. In a triangle of leaves. 
ILUMINATI.
i down vote because swain doesnt have crows he has ravens!
Both of which are members of the Corvidae family. Which, in Latin, stands for crow.
